main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in San Diego, CA on September 11, 1961, appearing as a bright saucer-shaped object.
interesting points: The object was described as four times as bright as Jupiter, The sighting lasted for only 3-4 seconds, The object traveled in an arc from south to north, It was considered a possible balloon, aircraft, or meteor but remained unidentified, Mr. R.S. Avence, a reliable observer aged 38, reported the sighting.
witness description: Mr. R.S. Avence, age 38, reliability good
